title: Doktorandplats – Psykosociala utmaningar och stödbehov efter operation för matstrups- eller magsäckscancer
description:
**Vill du bidra till att förbättra människors hälsa?**
------------------------------------------------------

*Att vara doktorand innebär att vara antagen till en utbildning på forskarnivå (forskarutbildning) där man följer en individuell studieplan. En doktorand ägnar sig åt ett forskningsprojekt under handledning, kompletterat med kurser och andra lärandeaktiviteter. För en doktorsexamen krävs motsvarande fyra års utbildning på forskarnivå på heltid.*

### **Forskargruppen**


Vår forskningsgrupp, Kirurgisk vårdvetenskap, består av forskare, biostatistiker, administratör, forskningssjuksköterska, app-utvecklare och doktorander. Arbetsmiljön är stimulerande och kreativ. Arbetsplatsen delas med en annan forskningsgrupp som vi har ett nära samarbete med. Vår forskningsgrupp studerar på olika sätt hälsorelaterad livskvalitet, symtom, viktutveckling och psykologiska aspekter hos patienter som opereras för matstrups- eller magsäckscancer. Du kan läsa mer om oss på vår hemsida

### **Doktorandprojektet och doktorandens uppgifter**


Det övergripande syftet med doktorandprojektet är att undersöka och identifiera psykosociala påfrestningar och problem efter diagnos och operation för matstrups- och magsäckscancer, samt identifiera vilken typ av stöd patienter har behov av. Doktorandprojektet består av fyra delstudier där de specifika målen är att undersöka:
  

1) Posttraumatisk stress hos patienter efter operation för matstrupscancer (Kvantitativ studie).
  

2) Posttraumatisk stress hos närstående till patienter som opererats för matstrupscancer (Kvantitativ studie).
  

3) Vilken typ av psykosocialt stöd patienter får efter diagnos och operation för matstrups- eller magsäckscancer, hur behoven av psykosocialt ser ut, och vilken typ av psykosocialt stöd som behövs på lång sikt efter operation och rehabilitering (Kvalitativ studie).
  

4) Effekten av egenvårdsråd relaterade till psykosociala påfrestningar och problem, tillhandahållna via mobilapplikationen REcovery after Cancer application (RECapp) (Delstudie inom en större randomiserad klinisk prövning).


I doktorandprojektet ingår intervjuer med patienter som opererats för matstrups- eller magsäckscancer. Vidare kommer doktoranden att få en ledande roll i den planerade kliniska RECapp prövningen.


Doktoranden kommer att få kunskap i olika studiedesigner i kliniska studier. Som doktorand arbetar du i ett team där alla arbetar mot samma mål och hjälps åt i vissa arbetsuppgifter. Doktoranden får arbeta med eller ta del i arbete som rör alla delar i ett forskningsprojekt, från projektplanering och etikansökningar till datainsamling, databearbetning och analyser samt vetenskapligt skrivande i form av artiklar och presentation av resultat vid nationella och internationella konferenser.

### **Vad erbjuder vi?**


En kreativ, internationell och inspirerande miljö fylld av kompetens och nyfikenhet. Karolinska Institutet är ett av världens ledande medicinska universitet. Här bedriver vi framgångsrik medicinsk forskning och har det största utbudet av medicinska utbildningar i Sverige. På KI får du träffa forskare med olika forskningsinriktningar som jobbar tillsammans. Det är det gränsöverskridande samarbetet som bidrar till KI:s världsledande position inom forskning. Som doktorand erbjuds du ett individuellt forskningsprojekt, en välutbildad handledare, ett stort utbud av valbara kurser och möjligheten att arbeta i en framgångsrik forskargrupp. Karolinska Institutet har samarbeten med framstående universitet över hela världen, vilket ger möjlighet till internationella utbyten. Som anställd doktorand får du en avtalsenlig lön, du får träna fritt i våra moderna friskvårdsanläggningar och du får ersättning för läkarvård.

### **Behörighetskrav för utbildning på forskarnivå**


För att delta i urvalet till en doktorandplats måste du styrka både det grundläggande **(A)** och det särskilda **(B)** behörighetskravet innan ansökningsperioden stänger.


Det är ditt ansvar som sökande att styrka din behörighet genom att följa instruktionerna på webbsidan Behörighet till utbildning på forskarnivå.

***A) Grundläggande behörighetskrav***


Du uppfyller det grundläggande behörighetskravet för utbildning på forskarnivå om du:

* har avlagt en examen på avancerad nivå (magister- eller masterexamen), **eller**
* har fullgjort kursfordringar om minst 240 högskolepoäng, varav minst 60 högskolepoäng på avancerad nivå, **eller**
* har på annat sätt förvärvat i huvudsak motsvarande kunskaper.\*


Följ instruktionerna på webbsidan Behörighet till utbildning på forskarnivå.

* Om du anser dig ha motsvarande kunskaper ska du följa instruktionerna på webbsidan Bedömning av motsvarande kunskaper för grundläggande behörighet till utbildning på forskarnivå.

***B) Särskilt behörighetskrav***

Du uppfyller det särskilda behörighetskravet för utbildning på forskarnivå om du:

* Intygar kunskaper i engelska (motsvarande Engelska B/Engelska 6 vid gymnasiet med godkänt betyg).


Följ instruktionerna på webbsidan English language requirements for doctoral education.

*Kontroll av dokument* Karolinska Institutet gör kontroll av dokumenten för att upptäcka förfalskningar. Karolinska Institutet förbehåller sig rätten att återkalla antagningsbeslut om förfalskningar eller oriktigheter påvisas. Inlämnande av falska handlingar är ett brott mot svensk lag och anses vara grund för rättsliga åtgärder.

### **Färdigheter och personliga egenskaper**


Krav utöver de grundläggande behörighetskraven:


1) Universitetsutbildning motsvarande magister inom psykologi.  

2) Utmärkta kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift (eftersom engelska är det språk vi främst använder inom gruppen och svenska är språket som används i datainsamlingsarbete med patientintervjuer).  

3) Personlighet med entusiasm, nyfikenhet, stor social kompetens, och god samarbetsförmåga.


Meriterande:

* 1) Erfarenhet av arbete med cancerpatienter.
* 2) Erfarenheter av (patient)intervjuer i forskningssyfte.
* 3) Kunskap om databaserade enkätverktyg och färdigheter i datainsamling.

### **Villkor**


Doktorandplatsen innebär en anställning som doktorand under maximalt 4 år på heltid.

### **Ansökan**


Du söker doktorandplatsen i rekryteringsverktyget Varbi. Använd knappen uppe till höger och följ anvisningarna. Vi ser gärna att din ansökan är skriven på engelska, men det går också bra att ansöka på svenska.


Din ansökan ska innehålla dessa dokument:

* Ett personligt brev och curriculum vitae
* Eventuella examensarbeten och publikationer
* Andra dokument som styrker de ovan efterfrågade färdigheter och egenskaper
* Dokument som styrker det grundläggande behörighetskravet (se **A** ovan)
* Dokument som styrker det särskilda behörighetskravet (se **B** ovan)

### **Urval**


Urval bland behöriga sökande görs med hänsyn till deras förmåga att tillgodogöra sig forskarutbildning. En samlad bedömning av de sökandes meriter och lämplighet kommer att göras.


Följande bedömningsgrunder tillämpas vid Karolinska Institutet:

* Dokumenterade ämneskunskaper av betydelse för forskningsområdet
* Analytisk skicklighet
* Övriga dokumenterade kunskaper/erfarenheter som kan ha betydelse för aktuell forskarutbildning


Alla sökanden kommer att få information när rekryteringen är slutförd.

**Vill du göra skillnad - och bidra till en bättre hälsa för alla? Sök till Karolinska Institutet**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: Fullstack Developer within AI Solutions
description:
**Our development and manufacturing of advanced stainless steels and special alloys is world leading. Our history goes back more than 160 years and since about two years we’re operating under a new brand and are listed on the stock exchange. An important step going forward is establishing an expert AI-team to identify opportunities where AI tools can bolster our capabilities further.**

 **About the Job**  

As a Fullstack Developer within AI Solutions at Alleima IT, you will play a crucial role in implementing and optimizing AI models and algorithms, ensuring they align with business objectives. Your focus will be on enhancing the performance and integration of generative AI within our technological framework.

 **Responsibilities**

* **AI Model Implementation:** Deploy and refine AI models and algorithms, ensuring they effectively meet business needs and integrate seamlessly within our technological frameworks.
* **Full Stack Development:** Utilize strong programming skills in Python and other relevant languages across various layers of the software stack to develop robust AI solutions.
* **Azure AI Integration:** Leverage hands-on experience with Azure AI services and tools to ensure the seamless functionality and performance of AI models.
* **Optimization and Troubleshooting:** Continuously improve AI system performance and reliability, troubleshoot issues, and optimize processes for maximum efficiency.
* **Full Development Lifecycle:** Participate in all phases of the development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, development, deployment, security by design, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.
* **Collaborative Development:** Work closely with subject matter experts, such as data scientists and architects, to implement model improvements based on new data insights and technological developments.

You do not shy away from leading trainings and workshops, and for the right person this role has potential to grow into project management and driving implementation initiatives within the area.  



Remote work within Sweden is possible.

**About You**  



We are seeking a technology-driven individual with:

* **Proficient Programming Skills**: Strong programming skills in Python and familiarity with AI development environments.
* **Front-End Development:** Proficiency in using front-end development frameworks and tools such as Angular and/or React.
* **Software Development Practices:** Knowledge of best practices for software development and data organization, with experience in Agile working methods and DevOps.
* **Azure AI Experience:** Skills and understanding of Azure AI services and tools.
* **Generative AI Experience:** Experience in generative AI implementations, especially its integration within frameworks like RAG.
* **Technical Proficiency:** Experience in app authentication, data storage options, data connections, APIs, and container deployment.

We put great emphasis on your personal attributes characterized by excellent collaborative skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams as well as the ability and desire to work broadly within the area in close collaboration with your teammates.  



**What you can expect from us**


Joining Alleima IT means becoming part of an innovative team that values practical and effective application of cutting-edge AI technology. You will contribute to projects that are crucial for our strategic technological advancements and enjoy a collaborative environment that fosters professional growth.  



At Alleima we believe that diversity and inclusion lead to a better workplace for our employees, our company, and our customers.  



**We care:** We take pride in what we do. We care about our customers, our people, the environment, the communities in which we operate and the future we share.  



**We deliver:** We deliver on our commitments, with a solution-oriented mindset, we enable our customers to be their very best: more efficient, profitable and sustainable.

**We evolve:** We constantly evolve. Together we take the lead to advance materials, ambitions, industries, ourselves – and societies for the better.

**Additional Information**


Anders Forslund, Head of Digital Center of Excellence


For questions about the position or recruitment process contact:


André Söderholm, Alleima HR, +46 76 529 65 77


Union Representatives:


Maria Sundqvist, Akademikerföreningen, 070 651 73 81  

Kjell-Åke Klockervold, Ledarna, 070 314 24 43  

Mikael Larsson, Unionen, 070 307 30 48  



**You are welcome with your application no later than 2024-06-10**


At Alleima, our mission is much more than delivering high-quality products, technology, and processes - working together to develop solutions based on our customer’s needs and thus achieve our business goals, is a better way to describe our daily work. With curious employees and safety as our priority, we create a work environment where you can develop both personally and professionally.

title: Java Developer
description:
**Job Description**  

Would you like to work in an internationally agile driven environment on solutions used in various parts of the world? Do you consider yourself a proactive, self-driven colleague who can take full ownership of the initiative working both independently and as part of a group?  

  

In this role, you will collaborate with a set of brilliant people co-tackling a variety of technical challenges and driven by a shared ambition to create hassle-free, efficient, and scalable solutions. You will join a diverse team in our Center of Excellence where you will work closely with the product to design and build features. You will be involved not only in backend development but also with testing, deployment, monitoring, architecture, code reviews, pair, and mob programming, etc. You will work with your peers across teams to make platform improvements and increase learning opportunities for everyone in a collaborative and nurturing environment. You will be actively encouraged to have open communication, respect diverse opinions and ideas, and demonstrate willingness to work together to create a positive and supportive culture that fosters innovation and creativity. This is an exciting opportunity to join our newly created community of talented developers supporting various product teams within the organization, which certainly will give you the opportunity to grow professionally.

 **Qualifications**  

Qualifications:

* Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience working with continuously delivered systems.
* Advanced level knowledge in Java, preferably 21 or at least 15 and above.
* Good knowledge on Azure, specifically Logic App, Service Bus, Function App, Storage Account.
* Knowledge of REST architecture (Express/HAPI/similar) and building APIs.
* Prior working experience with Spring Boot.
* Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests.
* User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments.
* Experience with database management (Cosmos DB, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
* Experience working with agile teams, planning, refining, delivering, and inspecting sprint deliveries.
* A genuine learning and knowledge sharing energy.
* Proactiveness and will-do attitude.
* Interest in or experience with Retail Industry.

 **Additional Information** **Company Description**.  

  

Shaping the future of fashion with people, data, and tech. The fashion and retail industries are going through a transformation, driven by customers' technology and sustainability expectations. At H&M Group, we want to shape the future of fashion and lifestyle by harnessing the power of smart tech and data. With our 74-year history of innovation, we understand the need to collaborate and co-create with engineers and tech specialists around the world to achieve our vision.

  

**What we offer**  

  

You are joining a unique value-driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, flexible work life, learning communities, wellness benefits, parental benefits etc. you are joining a unique value driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. There are endless opportunities to experiment and grow in any direction that you want and when you grow, we grow. Being a major player gives us countless opportunities to make a real impact and shape the future.  

  

H&M Group is a value-driven company that wants to lead the way to a more inclusive environment. We are committed to create an inclusive & diverse workplace with a culture that is dynamic and innovative.  

We welcome your application regardless of who you are, where you’re from and what you like.  

We welcome applicants with different backgrounds, perspectives, and skills.  

We welcome all applicants to strengthen our innovative and diverse culture.  

Learn more about our I&D work https://youtu.be/veRbl9Cijts


This is a full-time position with a placement in Stockholm. Closing date for this recruitment is 19th of September, we do however encourage candidates to send in their applications as soon as possible as we will conduct interviews continuously.


If you have any questions about the position, please reach out to the responsible hiring Talent Acquisition Partner, Marta Wieczorek, Marta.wieczorek@hm.com
company_description: At H&M, we welcome you to be yourself and challenge you to grow and make a difference. Help us reimagine the future of an entire industry, making everyone look, feel & do good.

title: Oracle ERP/EPM developer to SEB Life & Pension
description:
*Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success. We aim to drive positive change by providing capital to help everyone reach their goals and accelerate progress towards a sustainable tomorrow.* *Life & Pension in SEB is one of the largest pensions and insurance provider in Sweden and we serve both corporate and private customers. Our offering consists of products and services for important life events and by this we create certainty in an uncertain future. As a subsidiary in a large financial service group, we are able to benefit from a small company’s advantages that give you as an employee the possibility to influence and at the same time get access to a large company’s possibilities to develop and grow.*  

Are you passionate about technology and making a difference and ready to make a significant impact in the finance world with your expertise in Oracle Cloud? Join us in the role as Oracle ERP/EPM Developer in our digital transformation journey and be a part of our highly skilled engineering team. **About the role**
We're looking for an innovative and detail-oriented ERP/EPM Developer to join our dynamic team and support our Finance functions. If you're passionate about technology and finance, this role offers a unique opportunity to blend these interests and drive success in a supportive and inclusive environment.  

As our ERP/EPM Developer, you'll be an integral part of our team, leveraging your expertise in Oracle Cloud to design and configure top-notch solutions. You will: **Create Tailored Oracle Solutions:** Design and implement Oracle tools that align with best practices and our business needs.**Optimize Performance:** Monitor and fine-tune our systems to ensure they are running at peak efficiency.**Solve Problems:** Be at the forefront of resolving issues, ensuring smooth and effective operations.**Collaborate:** Work closely with a diverse team, sharing insights and driving continuous improvement. **Who You Are**
We're looking for an innovative and detail-oriented ERP/EPM Developer to join our dynamic team and support our Finance functions. To excel in this role, you believe you should have: **ERP/EPM Expertise:** Proven experience in configuring and developing ERP or EPM solutions.**Analytical Mindset:** Strong analytical skills to manage and interpret complex information.**Proactive Problem-Solver:** Excellent problem-solving abilities with a proactive approach to challenges.**Communicator:** Outstanding communication skills and fluency in English, making it easy to collaborate and share ideas.  

It's also considered meritorious if you have:**Financial Background:** Understanding of accounting or finance-related fields. **What we offer**
Joining our team means you'll enjoy a host of benefits designed to support your growth and well-being:**Learning Opportunities:** Access to extensive training programs and continuous learning resources.**Inclusive Culture:** A friendly and welcoming environment where everyone can thrive.**Innovation Hub:** Be part of an innovative company at the cutting edge of technology.**Industry Transformation:** Opportunities to help revolutionize the industry.**Global Mobility:** Career mobility within our expansive global network.**Modern Work Practices:** Embrace agile and modern ways of working.**Empowerment:** An empowering environment where your contributions truly matter.**Customer Impact:** Deliver world-class service and make a real difference for our customers.
Ready to join?
Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 9th of June 2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact Bo Anell, Head of IT Financial and Regulatory Reporting by email bo.anell@seb.se, or Karl Saeter, Talent Acquisition Partner, by email karl.saeter@seb.se.  

Learn more about working at SEB www.sebgroup.com/career.  

It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Business Development Representative, Nordics (Helsinki, Stockholm or Oslo)
description:
Elisa Polystar stands on top of the shoulders of Finnish operator Elisa, the leader in automation of networks. Our vision is to make self-driving networks happen for our customers, communication service providers.


We are a team of dedicated software developers, big data engineers, data scientists, telco engineers, sales professionals, and supporting the core roles are marketing, finance, HR and other business professionals.


We believe in transparency and Nordic work culture – make a significant contribution whilst having a healthy work-life balance.


  
### **Business Development Representative, Nordics (Helsinki, Stockholm or Oslo) – Helsinki, Finland**


Elisa is a pioneer in telecommunications and digital services. We serve approximately 2.8 million consumer, corporate and public administration organisation customers, and have over 6.3 million subscriptions in our extensive network. Our core markets are Finland and Estonia, and we also provide digital services for international markets.  

  

As a responsible Finnish market leader, our operations are guided by continuous improvement. Elisa is a pioneer in implementing new innovations and technologies, and is leading the way in developing 5G. Elisa has set ambitious science-based climate targets. We have been carbon neutral since 2020.  

  

Elisa is listed on the Nasdaq Helsinki Large Cap with approximately 167,000 shareholders. In 2022, our revenue was EUR 2.1 billion. The majority of our revenue comes from telecommunication services for consumer and corporate customers.  

  

Today we employ over 5,600 professionals in over 20 countries internationally.

*At* *Elisa IndustrIQ* *we are doing our part in making the world a little bit better – by building a sustainable future through digitalization and intelligent manufacturing. Elisa IndustrIQ is a Finnish group of industry-leading companies aiming to transform and optimize customers manufacturing and supply chain processes and achieve operational excellence through AI solutions. Industry leaders and governmental organizations all over the world use our products and solutions. We believe in bravely trying new approaches and trusting our own people to know best how to make our customers delighted.*


Are you looking to grow your skills in a friendly and highly professional environment? Do you feel like customer success and having an impact within the software sales market inspires you? Then keep reading!

**Job Description**


We are now looking for a **Business Development Representative (Nordics)** to join our growing, international team in Europe. Ideally you are based in Sweden, Norway or Finland as your focus will be on the Nordic market. We work remotely or together at the office, flexibly, depending on what works best for you and the team. No matter where you work, you will have the support of both local and global team mates.


You will have a pioneering and very important role in helping us develop new business and understand the needs of our stakeholders in the EHSQ management, manufacturing, and process industries sector. Main activities include:

* Identifying and qualifying new opportunities on the Nordic market and help Elisa IndustrIQ establish its footprint in the area – we already have successful products and solutions, now we just need you to help spread the word to this new market!
* A fair amount of cold-warm outreach combined with the ability to advance enterprise deals through the sales cycle.
* Reporting progress, discussing and resolving bottlenecks with the team and the management.
* Aligning and collaborating with marketing on campaigns, content, outreach etc. for these VIP customers.
* Working with HubSpot, Pandadoc, Zoominfo and other cool tools that we use to increase our impact.

**What are we looking for**


We don’t expect anyone to be a fully learned, perfect unicorn, because the fun part of a job is constantly learning and developing, right? If you tick most of these boxes, you may however be quite close to an actual unicorn:

* You have 2-3 years of experience in B2B technology sales
* Developing new business and charting new territory is exciting and inspiring to you.
* You have a sufficient level of creativity, project management, business analysis, and people management skills to craft sophisticated deals for large (international) organizations.
* You feel comfortable working with all levels and stakeholders in an organization, and you know how to clearly present insights, propose changes, and give presentations/demos.
* You are fluent in Swedish or Norwegian and able to work and communicate excellently in English.
* Experience with Account-Based Marketing, ability to provide input, reuse, and build on top of content marketing and B2B digital campaigns is a big plus but not a must have.
* You feel at home working in an international environment, with super friendly and professional (albeit sometimes a tad crazy) colleagues where bad jokes are welcome and we welcome all different kinds of people as they are.

**What’s in it for you?**


Elisa as a group has been chosen the best place to work in Finland many years in a row, and Elisa IndustrIQ is no different globally. We highly appreciate our supportive supervisors, our relaxed and friendly working environment, our strong culture of constant learning and improvement, and the fact that everyone is welcomed to be themselves at work, too. We love solving challenges through an unconventional and pragmatic approach, however never tolerating breaking the boundaries of trust, mutual respect or team-player spirit. At Elisa IndustrIQ you will belong to a global network and have access to innovative new technology. Our ambitious management is always eager to hear your ideas and inputs, and within Elisa IndustrIQ you are free to go as far as your skills and own ambitions take you.

**Interested?**


If you feel curious about how a future with Elisa IndustrIQ would look for you, you don’t need to wonder for long. Send us a short application through the link below, and we’ll be in touch with you shortly. Would you have any doubts or questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us: bastiaan.deblieck(a)tenforce.com.


For privacy policy in recruitments, check: www.elisapolystar.com/privacy-policy/

title: Delivery Solution Architect
description:
**Job Description**  

We are looking for an e-commerce expert with system and architectural knowledge to join our team within the Application Platform Online Area to support and drive changes in complex system movements, containing Business opportunity and Architectural improvements on a Global scale contributing to H&M’s digital journey.


Our mission is to maintain and evolve the Online Platforms, protecting and improving online channel revenue and develop the customer offer. You will be working in a dynamic environment with different short- and long-term initiatives.


Key responsibilities:

* Have a holistic technical and architectural view and understanding of our online e-commerce solution.
* Provide expertise when major changes are done and rolled out.
* Drive technical solutioning delivery, to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including developers, Architects, Product teams, and sales to name a few.

 **Qualifications**  

To be successful in this role we see that you have experience working as a solution of software architect with expertise in e-commerce. You are proficient in designing business processes and project delivery


What you need to succeed:

* Hands on experience from complex E-commerce deliveries and system integrations
* Being well organized with good coordination and communication skills
* Have a customer centric mindset
* To know how large initiatives/ projects are being implemented at global scale
* Excellent written and oral communication skills in English.
* Agile mindset


It is good if you have experience in:

* Hybris/SAP Commerce
* Development and technical leadership experience
* Experience with large, global organizations
* Information or data modelling
* FE components such as React, Next JS, App etc.

 **Additional Information**  

This is a full-time position based at our office in Stockholm. Apply by sending in your CV in English as soon as possible, but no later than the 25th of June. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through the career page.

**Benefits**  

We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.


In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.


**Inclusion & Diversity**  

H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.


We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.

**Company Description**


H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.
company_description: At H&M, we welcome you to be yourself and challenge you to grow and make a difference. Help us reimagine the future of an entire industry, making everyone look, feel & do good.

title: Junior Bag Designer Women’s Complement
description:
**Job Description** *Are you an experienced Junior Designer who wants to be* a key player in being part of developing our Women´s Bag & Belt collection?


Together with the rest of the team, you will assist in developing collections sold worldwide in all the H&M markets omni channels. This requires high energy, strong independent drive, creativity, and a new perspective. You will be responsible for assisting the Product Designer and being a part of a team of Designers, Product Developers, Planners, Pattern Makers, and Product Manager.


The role also involves technical flat sketching, working with different materials, assisting with product and sample comments & adjustments as well as detail follow up with production across bags & belts. This is a great opportunity for development with responsibility of a broad assortment with many articles! We are looking for a talented individual with a strong passion for women’s fashion & trends with a youth and fashion led eye. You are able to identify forward thinking trends and seasonal keys items.


You will contribute with updated fashion insights for our target customer with your fresh ideas, energy, creativity, and fully global perspective. We work with large ranges with many articles, so being a quick learner with good communication skills, a flexible attitude and capacity to adapt to changes, is essential!

 **Qualifications**  

* A BA/MA degree in Fashion, Bags/Accessories or Product Design
* A minimum of 1-2 years working as a Junior Designer within Bags
* High knowledge of materials, technical details, and processes of bags
* Strong and fast skills in Adobe Suite programs,
* 3D experience is meriting
* A visionary mindset with true passion for Women’s fashion, current and future trends
* A strong customer focus and commercial mindset
* Strong communication skills and true team player
* You are a problem solver who see simple solutions and innovative future possibilities
* Thrive in a fast-paced and everchanging work environment
* A fast learner with a strong self-drive and you can take own initiatives with ease
* A highly organized and structured work routine
* Fluent in English (Swedish not necessary)

  

**Additional Information**  

This position is based in Stockholm, to start in June 2024. You will report to the department Assortment Designer.


If your experience, skills, and ambitions are right for this role, **please send your application by Wednesday 5th June 2024 including CV and relevant portfolio work** (pdf max 10mb/uploading) Portfolio should include vision/mood boards, full design process and final collections and products from a variety of fashion design projects. All documents should be in English. Please ensure to include some work clearly relatable to the aspirational H&M Women’s target customer. Applications must include portfolio and meeting the above criteria to be considered! We would like see work that shows your creative aspirational side and also your sense for commercial fashion.


For any internal applicants please have a dialogue with your current manager before applying.

**Benefits**  

We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*

**Inclusion & Diversity**  

*H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse, and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience, and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.*

*We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.*

**Company Description**  

H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H & M here.

title: Relationsskapande & Säljande Konsultchef
description:
Jobbeskrivning


Inom AFRYS affärsområde Connected Products i Stockholm rör vi oss brett mellan teknikområdena elektronik, mjukvara, mekanik och projektledning. Våra kunder utvecklar framtidens teknik inom ett brett spektrum av olika branscher och produktområden, vilket gör att vi kan erbjuda våra konsulter och dig stor variation i arbetet.


Du kommer att ingå i ett fantastiskt team med 5 chefskollegor och säljare med mycket erfarenhet och kunskap som gillar att hjälpas åt!


Som sektionschef hos oss arbetar du med sälj, personal, rekrytering, ekonomi och strategier. Du kommer att ansvara för en egen konsultgrupp med ca 15st elektronikutvecklare. Förutom att ta väl hand om din personal kommer du tillsammans med en stor mängd andra kollegor att leta efter matchande uppdrag hos både nya och befintliga kunder.


Kvalifikationer


Vi letar efter dig som är en positiv och affärsinriktad lagspelare, motiverad av att skapa många och goda relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Du gillar utmaningar och drivs av att nå uppsatta mål. Du får energi av att göra affärer och gillar att hitta nya affärsmöjligheter då stort fokus kommer att vara ute hos våra kunder.


Du kommer att ha personalansvar och säljansvar, och du kommer att ha en fri roll där du utvecklar din grupp och ditt kundansvar.


Som ledare har du en coachande stil och du brinner för att jobba med människor och för att få dem att utvecklas.


För att passa in i denna roll är din personlighet och dina drivkrafter viktiga, men det är även en stor fördel om du har en förståelse för produktutveckling och i synnerhet inom elektronik. Du kanske har arbetat som utvecklare själv eller projektlett inom dessa områden tidigare.


Vi tror att du:

* Har en utbildning som Civil- eller Högskoleingenjör eller liknande
* Har erfarenhet av elektronikutveckling
* Har erfarenhet av försäljning av tjänster och/eller produkter.
* Har erfarenhet från en ledande roll
* Har erfarenhet som konsult (ej krav)
* Uttrycker dig obehindrat på engelska och svenska, både i tal och skrift då rollen innebär många kontakter både internt och externt.
* Har Svenskt B-körkort.


Vi ser varje anställd som en viktig pusselbit i vår gemensamma framgång och arbetar aktivt med att skapa en utvecklande och trivsam arbetsmiljö genom ett personligt ledarskap. Framför allt har vi roligt tillsammans!


Om du vill ha en roll med många sociala kontakter kombinerat med spännande teknik är det dig vi söker!


Företagsbeskrivning


*Brinner du för att träffa människor och bygga relationer?* *Vill du hjälpa andra människor att utvecklas och växa både som individer och kunskapsmässigt?*


Är du dessutom lösningsorienterad och gillar att det händer mycket, då har vi en fantastisk och väldigt varierande möjlighet för just dig.


Nu söker vi nämligen ytterligare en konsultchef till vår gruppering inom produktutveckling.


AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.


Ytterligare information


Kontakt för frågor:  

Maja Lindqvist  

Recruitment partner  

maja.lindqvist@afry.com

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

 *På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*


Apply information


Position


Relationsskapande & Säljande Konsultchef
Location


Stockholm
Country


Sweden
Reference number


REF9561S

Our headquarters are in Stockholm, Sweden yet our businesses and clients extend right across the globe. 

Frösundaleden 2

title: Frontend developer
description:
**Why Tendium?**  

Tendium is a tech company working in the space between technology and customers. Through advanced machine-learning technologies, we are revolutionising industries with modern, efficient methods, creating new possibilities to democratise both the public and private sector markets. The team at Tendium is expanding, with everyone from data scientists to salespeople working side by side, and now we want you to join us.


We are an ever-growing company comprised of some of the sharpest minds in Sweden. With such talent, we at Tendium naturally believe in a flat hierarchy where everyone has responsibility, autonomy, and the opportunity to provide input. Since we are increasing in size significantly, new opportunities are constantly emerging. We require ambitious, conscientious, and value-driven new colleagues to help grow the business. If you are successful in becoming a part of our team, we promise to provide a dynamic and intellectually stimulating workplace. We believe that personal and professional development is crucial, and as such, you will have the opportunity to take on real responsibility from day one.

**The Job**  

As a frontend-focused software engineer, you'll work in an agile, self-sufficient team with full ownership of the products and features you develop. Our process includes continuous delivery and sprint-based collaboration. Each team possesses a wide range of skills, including backend, frontend, infrastructure, and dev-ops.  

  

As a member of the Super1 Team, you will work together with the other developers in your team, closely with the product side as well as developers in the rest of the tech organisation. The team's area of responsibility within the organisation is developing and maintaining our customer-facing web platform. As a frontend developer in the team you will be working with developing new user-facing features, building reusable components and libraries, and collaborating closely with our backend developers and designers to ensure a good UX/UI experience. We encourage a high level of knowledge sharing, where you learn from and coach others in the team's development and strive for maintaining and implementing a high level of code quality and best practices.


We strive to use state-of-the-art technology and stay at the forefront of development. Agile practices ensure we build minimum viable products with high-quality code. We encourage all team members to contribute ideas, regardless of their expertise.


We prefer candidates based in Stockholm and operate in a hybrid environment. We believe in collaborating in a friendly and informal atmosphere.  

  

*This is a permanent full-time position (swe: tillsvidareanställning) with a 6-month probation period.*

 **Requirements:**

* Relevant MSc degree in Computer Science, Media Technology, or a related field.
* Minimum of 1-2 years of professional experience in frontend development with React.
* Experience with frontend architecture.
* Residence in Stockholm or surrounding areas.
* High proficiency in English.
* Eligible to work in Sweden.


**Meritorious****:**


* Experience with GraphQL.
* Proficiency in Swedish.


**Our current stack:**


* Frontend: React (TypeScript), GraphQL.
* Languages: TypeScript (Frontend, backend and infrastructure).
  


**Who We Are Looking For**  

For this position, we seek an individual who can demonstrate responsibility and initiative. You should value structure and possess a good ability to write readable and high-quality code. At Tendium, our tech teams prioritise continuous delivery, aiming for quality code without over-engineering. We appreciate constructive problem-solving and a willingness to take on new tasks and technologies. We value continuous learning and improvement, whether through deep expertise in one area or broad skill development.



Effective teamwork is essential and we are looking for those qualities in you. The ideal candidates should have at least 1-2 years of frontend development experience. Note that by experience, we do not necessarily mean employment. We care about what you can do, not how long you’ve been on the payroll.


**Application**  

We look forward to your application. We recruit on an ongoing basis, so apply as soon as possible. Successful candidates will be invited to a video interview where you will have the opportunity to meet the team.  

  

Please find additional information on our recruitment process *here.*  

If you want to know more about our culture and what you can expect when working at Tendium you can read more about it*here.*  

  

**Equality and inclusion statement**  

At Tendium we celebrate diversity and are committed to fostering an inclusive workplace. We welcome applications from individuals of all backgrounds, recognising that a diverse team enhances creativity and innovation. Join us in creating an environment where everyone can thrive and contribute their unique perspectives.

title: Senior Growth Engineer
description:
**At Epidemic Sound we are reinventing the music industry. Our carefully curated catalog, with over 40,000 tracks, is tailored for storytellers, streaming services, and in-store soundtracks. Countless clients around the world, from broadcasters, production companies, DSPs, and YouTubers rely on our tracks to help them tell their stories. Epidemic Sound’s music is heard in hundreds of millions of online videos daily, across millions of playlist streams, and in thousands of in-store locations. Headquartered in Stockholm, we’re spread across offices in New York City, Los Angeles, Seoul, Hamburg, and Amsterdam. We’re growing fast, have lots of fun, and are taking the music industry with us.**


We are looking for a Senior Growth Engineer to help us take our platform to the next level! The position is full-time and based in Stockholm.


**How you will make an impact**

Acquisition is seeking an experienced Growth Engineer with a strong focus on frontend development and user acquisition/growth to join our team. You’ll play a vital role in optimizing our conversion rate and shaping the first impression of visitors' interaction with Epidemicsound.com. You’ll work on public pages, signup flows, and the necessary tools and infrastructure required for user acquisition.


**What you’ll do**


* Collaborate closely with product teams, SEO team, and Performance Marketing team to drive growth and conversion rate optimization
* Conduct A/B tests and analyze data to improve user experience
* Act as an architect, taking ownership of complex technical projects, including planning, cross-team collaboration, and impact evaluation
* Utilize your expertise in frontend web development technologies such as Typescript, React, Next.js, HTML, and CSS
* Leverage your experience in backend development, particularly in Python and/or frameworks like Django
* Fostering an inclusive and collaborative culture
* Embrace agile development processes, including pair and mob programming, to share knowledge

**What you’ll bring**


* Experience from working as a fullstack developer, with focus on frontend development
* Strong knowledge using Typescript, React, HTML and CSS
* Experience from working with full stack frameworks like Django or Ruby on Rails.
* Strong interest in user growth, A/B testing, and interest and knowledge in experimentation and product analytics
* Experience working with web application performance, reliability, monitoring, and CI/CD

 **It would also be music to our ears if you have/are:**

* Familiar with SEO practices
* Knowledge of CMS systems

**Most importantly**


If you possess strong communication skills, a collaborative spirit, and a passion for personal and professional development, this is the opportunity you’ve been looking for. Join our team to work in an environment that fosters innovation and embraces diversity.

title: Karolinska Institutet söker Pedagogisk utvecklare
description:
**Var med och utveckla utbildning av högsta kvalitet**
------------------------------------------------------

**Undervisning och lärande gör under närmsta året en satsning att kontextualisera det pedagogiska stödet och stödja implementering av akademiskt lärarskap och hållbar undervisning.**

### **Din roll**


Du kommer driva ett pedagogiskt projekt som har till syfte att stärka det pedagogiska samtalet på olika nivåer inom Karolinska Institutet. Projektet ska utveckla och genomföra relevant kontextuellt stöd till och tillsammans med våra användare och vara grundat i Karolinska Institutets pedagogiska grundsyn. Arbetet är utforskande och iterativt och ska genomföras i samarbete med våra målgrupper och ska identifiera generaliserbarheter.  

Initiera akademiskt lärarskap/hållbar undervisning.


I dina arbetsuppgifter kommer ingå att

* Driva och leda arbetsgrupp inom projektet
* Att planera, genomföra och följa upp projekt och utbildningsinsatser för att främja pedagogisk utveckling och kontinuerligt lärande.
* Att utforska och utvärdera olika metoder för reflektiv praktik.
* Att i samspråk med medarbetare utveckla metoder för att analysera och följa upp pedagogiskt stöd.
* Att bidra till att utveckla strategier för organisatoriskt lärande på enheten och universitetet.

### **Vem är du?**


För att vara kvalificerad för uppdraget som pedagogisk utvecklare på Karolinska Institutet krävs att du har:

* Lägst magisterexamen inom pedagogik eller annat relevant område.
* Goda kunskaper om pedagogisk teori och praktik, särskilt inom akademiskt lärarskap och hållbar undervisning.
* God erfarenhet av att arbeta med pedagogisk stöd i högskolesamanhang.
* Erfarenhet och god förmåga att kommunicera, samarbeta och leda projekt i en akademisk miljö.


I denna rekrytering lägger vi stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Vi ser gärna att du är relationsskapande, har ett strukturerat och inkluderande arbetssätt. Då arbetet innebär utveckling av nya strukturer är det viktigt med flexibilitet där du kan arbeta mot rörligt mål och hantera förändringar.

### **Vad erbjuder vi?**


En kreativ, internationell och inspirerande miljö fylld av kompetens och nyfikenhet. Karolinska Institutet är ett av världens ledande medicinska universitet. Vår vision är att driva utvecklingen av kunskap om livet och verka för en bättre hälsa för alla. Här bedriver vi framgångsrik medicinsk forskning och har det största utbudet av medicinska utbildningar i Sverige. Som universitet är Karolinska Institutet en statlig myndighet. Det gör att du får goda förmåner genom vårt kollektivavtal. Medarbetare på KI erbjuds också möjlighet till ett flexibelt arbetssätt. Det innebär att om den verksamhet du jobbar i tillåter, så kan du arbeta en del av din arbetstid på distans. Du får även träna fritt i våra moderna friskvårdsanläggningar där utbildad personal finns på plats.

**Placering:** Flemingsberg

*Undervisning och Lärande*

*Tio skäl att välja Karolinska Institutet*

### **Ansökan**


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan senast den 7 juni 2024


Ansökan ska göras via rekryteringssystemet Varbi. I denna rekrytering söker du med ditt CV utan personligt brev. I ansökningsformuläret kommer du istället att få svara på några frågor om varför du söker jobbet.

**Vill du göra skillnad – och bidra till en bättre hälsa för alla? Sök jobb hos oss**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Anställningsform: tidsbegränsad anställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Huddinge | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: STÖD 2-2220/2024 | Kontakt: Teresa Sörö / teresa.soro@ki.se 0737121390, | Facklig företrädare: Taher Darreh-Shori, SACO taher.darreh-shori@ki.se, Bodil Moberg , OFR 08-52483601, | Publicerat: 2024-05-24 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-06-07

title: Unity Game Developer Internship
description:
Are you ready to dive into the game development world? We're looking for a passionate Game Developer (**unpaid internship**) to join our remote team. We’re on the brink of something big, and we need your creativity and drive to help make it happen.



What You’ll Bring:


* **Skills in Networking or AI:** Got some cool skills in networking or AI? We want to see what you can do!
* **Unity & C# Experience:** Have you been playing around with Unity and C# for a while? Show us some of your projects.
* **Ready to Dive In:** This is a full-time gig for six months. We're looking for someone ready to commit and make an impact.
* **Great at Communicating:** You should be comfortable talking and collaborating in English.

  

Nice-to-Have:


* **A Creative Portfolio:** We love seeing creative solutions and clever projects. Surprise us with what you’ve worked on!
* **Extra Skills:** Know your way around Unity Profiler, Photon PUN, or love making things look and sound good? Tell us about it!
* **Love for RTS Games:** Big plus if you’re into Real-Time Strategy games!

  




Perks of the Internship:


* **Grow Your Skills:** Jump into the game industry. You'll learn tons by actually doing stuff, getting mentorship, and joining workshops.
* **Be Part of the Team**: Our team might be small, but we’re all about making a big impact.
* **Work Your Way:** We get it—life’s busy. We offer flexible hours so you can find a rhythm that works for you.
* **Expand Your Network:** Meet people in the industry and grow your list of contacts.
* **Have a Say:** Your ideas will help shape our projects. We want your input.
* **A Shining Letter:** Finish up with a recommendation letter that showcases all you’ve accomplished.
* **Build Your Portfolio:** Work on actual games that you’ll be proud to show off as part of your portfolio.

  




Let’s Get Started:



Excited to jumpstart your career in game development? Apply now and let’s create something great together. We can’t wait to see what you bring to our team!


  
Landell Games
Ruotsi
Kokopäiväinen
Julkaistu 24.05.2024

title: Digital Analyst with Technical Focus to ICA Banken
description:
**Digital Analyst with** **Technical Focus****to** **ICA** **Banken**


We are on an exciting journey to develop the area within Digital Analytics to work more data-driven, and we are currently looking for a curious and motivated Technical Implementation Specialist with experience in digital analytics, CRO & digital platforms. Are you who we are looking for?

 **This is your future job!**


It's the perfect time to join our Analytics & Customer Value competence area. The competence area is built up of highly skilled Digital Analysts, Data Analysts, Business Analysts, Customer Value Specialists and Data Scientists who, together with the business, drive our digital and agile transformation forward. You will be a key part of this exciting journey and will proactively work in the Digital Analytics & CRO team supporting with developing our digital channels.

  

More specifically, you will:

* Take responsibility for the set up and maintenance of the measurability strategy across multiple digital channels, such as implementation, tag management and tracking.
* Create easily digestible dashboards to support self-serve data for stakeholders to inform decision-making.
* Provide actionable insights and develop recommendations based on measurement reporting and deep dive analysis, utilising online and offline data.
* Work hands on with Google Big Query to do deep dive analyses with behavioural data.
* Collaborate with the wider Analytics team across BI, CRM and Data Science on cross channel personalisation projects, throughout the customer lifecycle.
* Develop a strong working relationship with the key stakeholders to ensure deliveries that are in line with expectations and the overall company strategy.
  

In this role, there will be a lot of development potential and you will create a large network within ICA Bank & ICA Insurance, as you will be expected to collaborate with different teams such as Marketing, Product, IT, Business to Consumer and Insurance. The position is located in our light and airy headquarters in Solna, and you report to the Chief Analytics Officer (CAO).

 **Who are you****?**


In terms of experience, we are looking for:

* 2+ years of experience as a Digital Analyst/Implementation Specialist.
* Experience using web based and analytical tools such as Google Analytics, Big Query and SQL.
* Experience working with tracking and tag management.
* Demonstrated understanding of measurability and experience of implementation, with the ability to easily communicate with web / app developers.
* Experience collaboration with other analytics teams and developers.
* Willingness to learn and educate others within the field.
* Passionate about working in a highly collaborative and agile environment.
  

It is advantageous if you have worked within a Bank or Insurance company, and if you have previous experience with Jira and/or MS DevOps. Experience of working in an agile organisation and understanding of the agile way of working is also a merit.


We are looking for someone who has sharp analytical and technical skills and likes to make things happen. It is easy for you to look up and see the big picture and you work in a structured way. You are confident in yourself and your skills and are happy to share your knowledge. Furthermore, you have a genuine interest and follow trends regarding Digital Analytics & CRO and you are passionate about working in a cooperative and agile environment.


The role requires that you speak and write fluently in English and understand spoken and written Swedish.

 **Contact Information**


Questions about the position can be answered by the Recruiting Manager, Sylvia Ndikumasabo 0706 04 11 09. Questions about the recruitment process can be answered by the Recruiter, Bojana Mijocevic, 010-422 22 52.

 **Last day to** **apply**


Apply as soon as possible, as we recruit on an ongoing basis. Alternatively, closing date 2024/06/23

  

 We are supposed to mirror our customers as well as the society and require employees with different competences. We strive at recruiting people with different backgrounds and value knowledge and experience that brings in. We value good conditions for a sustainable work life by have a good working environment and possibilities to constant evolution. If roles require it, you will need to undergo tests, background checks and drug testing before employment.


Are you curious about us and want to become one of our new colleagues? Of course, you are! Welcome with your application!

title: Backend developer .NET to Hallon
description:
*Hallon is a sister operator of the mobile operator Tre and started in May 2013 with the vision to provide a simple connection every day for everyone. We’ve had a digital focus from the very beginning with a focus on selling and serving our customers via hallon.se and our apps.*

  

**Andreas – developer at Hallon**.  

What is it like to work with tech at Hallon?  

*"I learn new things daily because we use the latest technology. Our culture is characterized by curiosity and knowledge sharing, and we are constantly at the forefront. I see Hallon as a long-term employer that invests in my personal development."*


**About the role**  

As a backend developer at Hallon, you will play a key role in developing and realizing our vision of creating the best customer experience at hallon.se. You will belong to an agile development team of around ten people with mixed skills, four of whom work with backend development. You are involved with the team in deciding architecture and technology choices. At Hallon, we want to learn from each other and share knowledge, so we sometimes work with couple- and mob programming.



In the role, you also get to take responsibility, together with the team, for our cloud infrastructure's set of new components and maintenance in Azure. Our backend is built on .NET and microservices architecture. We also use Azure cloud, Kubernetes, ServiceBus, MongoDb, and Redis. Our front end is based on Next and Typescript. We also use Node.js, styled-components, Cypress, JEST, CI/CD in Azure, Docker, Redux Toolkit, Storybook, and React native.


**You will look forward to**


* get great opportunities to continue developing, get time and resources to write code with high quality, and great freedom to influence design and architecture
* be part of a team that wants to build the future and be close to the business with technology at the center
* work with experienced and knowledgeable colleagues who are passionate about their profession
* to be part of Sweden's best workplaces in 2024 according to Great Place To Work and that we are top-ranked by Career Companies by IT-Young Professionals
* belong to an employer that wants to contribute to women wanting to choose and stay in the technology industry; we are proud partners of Women in Tech and Tjejer Kodar


**Who are you?**  

As a person, you solve problems by rethinking and taking input from others. You are curious and realize the unique opportunity to learn the different parts of technology. Furthermore, you have a high commitment and interest in backend development. You like to take responsibility, and it is in your nature to act proactively by going the extra mile for you and your colleagues.



To succeed in the role, you need to have several years of experience in object-oriented development in .NET. It is advantageous if you know DevOps Azure Cloud. As we work in an international culture, spoken and written English is a matter of course for you.


**Your application**  

We accept applications via this advertisement and will hold interviews on an ongoing basis. A personal letter is not necessary, but we would like you to answer the questions we have asked below in connection with your application. For questions, contact recruiting manager Saul Amram.



A warm welcome to Hallon!

  



#LI-PRIORITY


**Contact**
-----------

### **Saul Amram**


saul.amram@hallon.se
